messages.content: What does the ComfyUI_TextAssets node allow you to do?
The ComfyUI_TextAssets node allows you to upload text files to the input folder from your local computer.
Is the ComfyUI_TextAssets node used for uploading image files?
No, the ComfyUI_TextAssets node is specifically used for uploading text files, not image files.
Can you upload text files from your local computer using ComfyUI_TextAssets node?
Yes, you can upload text files from your local computer to the input folder using the ComfyUI_TextAssets node.
Does the ComfyUI_TextAssets node support uploading files from remote locations?
Based on the provided information, the ComfyUI_TextAssets node allows uploading text files from your local computer. There is no mention of support for uploading files from remote locations.
What is the purpose of uploading text files using the ComfyUI_TextAssets node?
The purpose of uploading text files using the ComfyUI_TextAssets node is to make them available in the input folder, likely for further processing or utilization within the ComfyUI application.
Is there a visual representation provided for the ComfyUI_TextAssets node?
Yes, there is an image file named 'ss.png' that visually represents the ComfyUI_TextAssets node.
Does the ComfyUI_TextAssets node have any restrictions on the type of text files that can be uploaded?
Based on the provided information, there are no specific restrictions mentioned regarding the type of text files that can be uploaded using the ComfyUI_TextAssets node.
